EmailTemplate.description: More information about the wall plaque
EmailTemplate.name: Product: Wall plaque follow-up
EmailTemplate.subject: Follow-up to our talk
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Informalname__c},
Thank you for your time today. I enjoyed speaking with you!
I recommend that you take a look at our wall plaque. The plaques are designed to shine in your office and generate great conversation with clients and peers as you share the news about your award and magazine appearance.
Our wall plaques feature a compelling design on raised glass overlay with high-end finishes and wood options of high-quality mahogany or black. Click here to see some samples and details.
Pricing for the wall plaques are $225 for a single and $325 for the double, customized plaque.
If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact me. Congratulations on winning the 2015 Five Star {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Profession__c}!
Thank you,
{!User.Name} Account Manager
Five Star Professional 2900 Lone Oak Parkway Suite 120 Eagan, MN 55121
Direct: {!User.Phone} Main: 1-888-438-5782 Fax: 651-259-1940 {!User.Email} www.fivestarprofessional.com
